name: Kutaka Run
description:
A short game inspired by Cookie Run. Run, jump, slide and collect ingredients to prepare the best lunch for Urumi!

Note: The game has a language toggle but the text is only partially translated into Spanish.

Controls

  • Jump: Space bar or left click. Press again while in the air to double jump.
  • Slide: Down key or right click.
  • While playing a level, press the Home key to start again.
  • You can press the Esc key to skip the story.

Credits:

  • Music: WarxTron
  • Concept and story: Hyn, illusorybread
  • Art and programming: illusorybread

Special thanks to Adam for creating the wonderful PAX-24 palette.

Changelog:

Version 1.0.2 (02/07/2022):

  • Tweaked item scores for more variety.
  • Saving and displaying the high score in the title screen.
  • Fixed the text shown when the player completes a level.
  • Added parallax to the Pride Time level background.

Version 1.0.1 (01/07/2022):

  • Fixed text so it properly displays quotes and single quotes.
  • Added missing music to title screen and story screens.
  • Added an icon and a splash screen.
  • Updated itch.io page with cover image, screenshots, and game description.

Version 1.0.0 (01/07/2022):

  • Jam build.
